title: Contingency insurance (event cancellation, non-appearance)
dataVerified: Event organizer, performer, coverage trigger, coverage amount, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/paid). Link to Lloyd's/insurer system (organizers and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake contingency insurance. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate/specialist. High-value events ($10M-$100M+ revenue). Celebrity non-appearance coverage. Tour cancellation. Adverse weather. Pandemic coverage (post-COVID).
